# Questions

```{r}
#| echo: false

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(NatParksPalettes)
library(paletteer)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
# Get unique list of questions
questions <- responses_pretty %>%
  select(QUESTION_NUMBER) %>%
  arrange(QUESTION_NUMBER) %>%
  distinct(QUESTION_NUMBER)
```

```{r}
# Filter responses for a single question
i <- 1
current_question <- questions$QUESTION_NUMBER[1]
question_responses <- responses_pretty %>%
  filter(QUESTION_NUMBER == current_question)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(question_responses, 
            aes(RESPONSE, 
                fill = RESPONSE, 
                #colour = RESPONSE
                )
            ) +
  geom_bar(show.legend = FALSE) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=natparks.pals("KingsCanyon", 6)) +
  #theme_minimal() + 
  facet_grid(~PROGRAMTYPE_NAME)
p
```
